ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the medical condition or event under control?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC SDTM Yes No Unknown or Not Applicable Response Terminology
ReferenceDocuments.description: Terminology codelist used with Yes No Unknown or Not Applicable Response within the Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium Study Data Tabulation Model.

ReferenceDocuments.name: SUPPMH.QVAL
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. This information could be submitted in a SUPPMH dataset as the value of SUPPMH.QVAL where SUPPMH.QNAM ="MHCTRL" and SUPPMH.LABEL="Medical Condition Under Control". Refer to the current SDTM and SDTMIG for instructions on placement of non-standard variables in SDTM domains.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: MHCTRL is not defined in the SDTMIG MH domain. If collected, it should be submitted in the SUPPMH dataset. If MHCTRL is collected, the sponsor must provide information on the relative timeframe. Generally, MHDAT is collected or determined using the visit date of the collection to indicate this is the subject's status at the time of data collection.

DataElement.changeDescription: 2021-6-14 ak Released per governance approval. Created as part of the CDISC mapping task_ghd_08.21.18
